name: Airshark
description:
Rule the skies!

Q to quit.

Click to shoot.

Enjoy!

Creative Notes.  Used purchased assets for f24 and mig29 static models from Turbosquid which were then retopoogized, reskinned, retextured, and rigged (f24) for the game. All other art including the music, models, particle effects, and grass shader were created for and during the jam. Enjoy!
